com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model

Class OdpSortCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model.OdpSortCriteria

  • public class OdpSortCriteria
extends Object
    Sort criteria for ODP search results data grid. Defines sortable columns and sort direction.
    Author:
    Claude Code

        Returns:

      • toggleSort

        public void toggleSort(OdpSortCriteria.SortableColumn column)
        Toggle sort for a column. If already sorting by this column, toggles direction. If sorting by different column, sets new column with ASC direction.
        Parameters:
        column - the column to sort by

        public void clear()
        Clear sorting criteria
